snippet.title: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit the website: https://atelier.games/yumia/uk/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=LaunchUK&utm_id=Caption

Walk the forbidden path, no matter where it leads…

Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land is now available on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Steam®. 

In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo," the alchemist Yumia yearns for the "truth" that lies hidden in the ruined continent. Now, she takes her first steps on a grand adventure across the continent.

Follow us: 
X: https://x.com/koeitecmoeurope
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koeitecmoeurope/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmogames
Gust Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ateliergames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTEurope

*Screens are taken from an in-development version.

#atelieryumia #atelierseries #koeitecmo
